sub_concepts.name: Linear momentum
sub_concepts.definition: The quantity of motion of an object, which is the product of its mass and velocity.

sub_concepts.name: Impulse
sub_concepts.definition: The change in momentum of an object when a force is applied over a period of time.

sub_concepts.name: Angular momentum
sub_concepts.definition: The quantity of rotational motion of an object, which is the product of its moment of inertia and angular velocity.
